comments:
Steps to reproduce:

1) Install Eclipse 3.1 and FTP/WebDav 3.1
2) Create new project
3) Open Site Explorer view
4) Create new FTP site
5) Browse site
6) Shut down Eclipse
7) Re-open Eclipse
8) Select site

A dialog box is displayed:
"An error has occurred. See error log for more details."

The stack trace for the error is:
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:

Selecting the properties of the site and re-entering the user and password sorts
out the problem until you next shut down Eclipse.
On IRC it was noted that this is probably a dup of bug 102785 which is now fixed.

It's actually a dup of 22892 which is not fixed. You can set the password by opening the properties on the site from the Site Explorer.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 22892 ***
